name: Home Creator
description:
Home Creator provides you with a set of tools to create your dream home! Choose the size of the room, change the walls and flooring, arrange sofas, cabinets, tables, cabinets, chandeliers, sinks and much more! Fill your house with furniture and appliances, cut through windows and doors. Home Creator will make you feel like a real interior designer!

Main Features


  • Many different items to create your interior.
  • Intuitive interface, convenient item management system.
  • Minimalistic visual style and pleasant background music.
